column3: hom ntwe mbɛn mbetsie; na aman e
column4: hom nyɛ aso: wɔmma asaase nye ne mayɛ ntsie; wiadze
column5: nye ndzɛmba nyinara a wofi mu ba."

column2: "Na EWURADZE wɔ ebufuhyew wɔ amanaman nyinara do
column3: na ebufuw wɔ hɔn dɔm nyinara do: ɔasɛɛ hɔn huntuhuntu
na hɔn efun no bɔnee bɔfow sor
column4: na wɔdze hɔn bɔgyaa anan mbepɔw."

column3: na wɔabobɔw ɔsorsor dɛ nwoma: na hɔn dɔm nyinara bɔpo egu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ahaban fi wenyindua do po
column5: na dɛ mbrɛ adɔmbadua do haban ɔpo."

column2: "Na m’afona anom amee wɔ ɔsor: hwɛ
column3: obesian aba ebobu atsɛn wɔ Edom
column4: na ɔman a madom no no do."

column5: na nguannyin nsɛbɛ ho seradze. EWURADZE wɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ Bozra
column6: na okum kɛse wɔ Edom asaase do."

column2: "Na anantwi abɔyafo dze hɔn bɔhwehwe famu
column3: na anantwisaa ɔnye anantwinyin so. Na bɔgya bɔbow asaase
nhyɛananmu afe a obedzi ama Zion."
na no huntuma adan ogya sɔɔfee na n’asaase adan ihua a ɔdzɛw."

column2: "Worunndum no adzesaa anaa adzekyee; no wusiw bɔfow sor daapem: ɔbɛyɛ amamfo ofitsi ebusuasantsen akɛpem ebusuasantsen; na obiara nnkotwa mu dabiarada."
"Na akoroma na kɔtɔkɔ na wɔbɛfa; na patu na akonkoran atsena hɔ; na ɔdze asakrabutuw ahoma

column4: na ne mbapɔmba nyinara nnkɛsɛ hwee."

column3: nsason na nkɔkrɔw wɔ n’akoban mu: na ɔbɛyɛ mpataku tsenabea

column2: "Na mbowa abɔyafo na mpataku behyia wɔ hɔ
column3: na apɔnkyenyin bɛka mu afrɛ ne nyɛnko; nyew

column5: na ɔaka hɔn aboa ano wɔ no nwinwin ase: nyew
column6: hɔ na nsansaa bɔboa hɔn ano

column3: na hom nkenkan. Iyinom mu biara nnkɛyew
column4: obiara ne tsiafo nnkɔbɔ no: na EWURADZE n’ano na ɔahyɛ
column5: na no sunsum na ɔapra hɔn aboa ano."

column3: na ne nsa na ɔdze susuhoma akyekyɛ mu ama hɔn: wobenya ayɛ hɔndze daa
column4: na wɔatsena mu fitsi mbasantsen do ekodu mbasantsen do."
